javadoc:
ProgramDiffDetails is used to determine the detailed differences between
 two programs at a particular address. The differences are determined for
 the extent of the code units from each program at a particular address.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: p1
params.comment: the original program

params.name: p2
params.comment: the program to diff against.

methods.name: getDiffDetails
methods.comment:
Gets a string indicating the types of differences for the code units at the indicated
 address. The string contains information from each program where there are differences.
 It containing multiple lines separated by newline characters)

params.name: p1
params.comment: the original program

params.name: p2
params.comment: the program to diff against.

params.name: p1DiffAddress
params.comment:
the address that difference details are needed for.
 This address should be derived from program1.

methods.name: getDiffDetails
methods.comment:
Gets a string indicating the types of differences for the code units at the indicated
 address. The string contains information from each program where there are differences.
 It containing multiple lines separated by newline characters)

params.name: p1
params.comment: the original program

params.name: p2
params.comment: the program to diff against.

params.name: p1DiffAddress
params.comment:
the address that difference details are needed for.
 This address should be derived from program1.

params.name: filter
params.comment: the program diff filter that indicates the diff details to show.

methods.name: getDiffDetails
methods.comment:
Gets a string indicating the types of differences for the code units at the indicated
 address. The string contains information from each program where there are differences.
 It containing multiple lines separated by newline characters)

params.name: p1DiffAddress
params.comment:
the address that difference details are needed for.
 This address should be derived from program1.

methods.name: getDiffDetails
methods.comment:
Gets a string indicating the types of differences for the code units at the indicated
 address. The string contains information from each program where there are differences.
 It containing multiple lines separated by newline characters)

params.name: p1DiffAddress
params.comment:
the address that difference details are needed for.
 This address should be derived from program1.

params.name: filter
params.comment: the program diff filter that indicates the diff details to show.

methods.name: getAllDetails
methods.comment:
Determine the detailed differences between the two programs at the
 indicated address. The differences are determined for the extent of the
 code units in the two programs at the indicated address.

params.name: p1DiffAddress
params.comment:
the address that difference details are needed for.
 This address should be derived from program1.

params.name: doc
params.comment:
the document where the details of differences between the two
 programs should be written.

params.name: prefixString
params.comment: Line of text to display at beginning of the difference details information.

methods.name: getDetails
methods.comment:
Determine the detailed differences between the two programs at the
 indicated address. The differences are determined for the extent of the
 code units in the two programs at the indicated address.

params.name: p1DiffAddress
params.comment:
the address that difference details are needed for.
 This address should be derived from program1.

params.name: filter
params.comment: the program diff filter that indicates the diff details to show.

params.name: doc
params.comment:
the document where the details of differences between the two
 programs should be written.

params.name: prefixString
params.comment: Line of text to display at beginning of the difference details information.

methods.name: getDetailsAddressSet
methods.comment:
Gets the address set where detailed differences will be determined for details at the
 indicated address. An address set is returned since the indicated address may be in different
 sized code units in each of the two programs.

params.name: p1Address
params.comment:
the current address where details are desired.
 This address may be from program1 or program2.

return.comment: the program1 address set for code units containing that address within the programs being diffed.

name: ProgramDiffDetails
comment:
ProgramDiffDetails is used to determine the detailed differences between
 two programs at a particular address. The differences are determined for
 the extent of the code units from each program at a particular address.
